posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joe D.
that I am still making some purchases...

does someone have a Mayo Football card to sell me?

would like to grab one to have now and eventually get started on these cards.

If so, email me.

Regards,
Joe

Posted By: John S
Hey Joe,

I don't know what condition would be acceptable, but this beater is on eBay currently.  N302's usually pop up on eBay sporadically but you can count on at least a dozen per year in more acceptable shape than this one.  

[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&ih=019&item=290030987142&rd=1&sspagename=STRK%3AMEWA%3AIT&rd=1[/url]

If you have the change, Joe Colabella always has a great selection. 

[url]http://www.joecolabella.com/[/url]

As you know these are tough cards in any condition and harder to find than their N300 counterparts.  Best of luck (that your wife doesn't catch you).
